org.forgerock.openidm.audit.util

Interface ActivityLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullActivityLogger, RouterActivityLogger

    public interface ActivityLogger
    Create an audit activity log for a request result.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log(org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext context,
       org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestType requestType,
       String message,
       String objectId,
       org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue before,
       org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue after,
       Status status)
         throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
        Write an activity audit log.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the request to log
        requestType - the type of request to log
        message -
        objectId - the resourceId being operated on
        before - the object value "before" the request
        after - the object value "after" the request
        status - the status of the operation
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - on failure to write to audit log unless suppressed.
